import React from "react" import { authEndpoint, clientId, redirectUri, scopes } from "../auth/config" import Modal from "react-bootstrap/Modal" import Button from "react-bootstrap/Button" import styled from "styled-components" const ModalHeader = styled.span` text-align: center; font-size: 3rem; ` const Login = () => { return ( <> BPM Playlist Maker
This app allows you to create playlists based on the BPM of songs to create perfectly customized running playlists.
) } export default Login
